name: octoboot
description: OctoBoot is a fast, powerful, and user friendly tools to create your own website in a few clic, all free !! (with help of some free/custom template and gh-pages)

scripts.start: npm run build:ts && npm run build:model && npm run build:handlebars
scripts.build:ts: tsc src/front/OctoBoot.ts --removeComments --sourceMap --out dist/octoboot.js && uglifyjs dist/octoboot.js -o dist/octoboot.js --mangle --compress
scripts.build:model: tsc src/front/model/ServerApi.ts --out src/back/model/serverapi.js && echo 'module.exports = OctoBoot.model.ServerAPI' >> src/back/model/serverapi.js

author: RonanDrouglazet
